00215 // load the background panel graphics for inventory
00216 BOOLEAN LoadInventoryPoolGraphic( void )
00217 {
00218       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc; 
00219 
00220       // load the file
00221       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00222 
00223       // WANNE 2
00224       if (iResolution == 0)
00225       {
00226             MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS = 8;
00227             MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT = 40;
00228             MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X = 269;
00229         MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y = 51;
00230             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\sector_inventory.sti" );
00231       }
00232       else if (iResolution == 1)
00233       {
00234             MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS = 11;
00235             MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT = 77;
00236             MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X = 278;
00237         MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y = 62;
00238             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\sector_inventory_800x600.sti" );
00239       }
00240       else if (iResolution == 2)
00241       {
00242             MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS = 17;
00243             MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT = MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_MAX_SLOTS;
00244             MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X = 282;
00245             MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y = 50;
00246             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\sector_inventory_1024x768.sti" );
00247       }
00248       
00249       // add to V-object index
00250       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMapInventoryPoolBackground));
00251       
00252       return( TRUE );
00253 }

00280       CheckAndUnDateSlotAllocation( );
00281

00313 void RenderItemsForCurrentPageOfInventoryPool( void )
00314 {
00315       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00316 
00317       // go through list of items on this page and place graphics to screen
00318       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ; iCounter++ )
00319       {
00320             RenderItemInPoolSlot( iCounter, ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) );
00321       }
00322 
00323       return;
00324 }

00327 BOOLEAN RenderItemInPoolSlot( INT32 iCurrentSlot, INT32 iFirstSlotOnPage )
00328 {
00329       // render item in this slot of the list
00330       INT16 sCenX, sCenY, usWidth, usHeight, sX, sY;
00331       HVOBJECT hHandle;
00332       ETRLEObject       *pTrav;
00333       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
00334       INT16 sWidth = 0, sHeight = 0;
00335       INT16 sOutLine = 0;
00336   BOOLEAN fOutLine = FALSE;
00337 
00338       // check if anything there
00339       if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.ubNumberOfObjects == 0 ) 
00340       {
00341             return ( FALSE );
00342       }
00343 
00344       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.usItem ] ) ) );
00345 
00346       pTrav = &( hHandle->pETRLEObject[ Item[pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.usItem ].ubGraphicNum] );
00347       usHeight                      = (UINT16)pTrav->usHeight;
00348       usWidth                             = (UINT16)pTrav->usWidth;
00349 
00350       // set sx and sy
00351       sX = ( INT16 )( MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_OFFSET_X + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS ) * ( iCurrentSlot / MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) );
00352       sY =  ( INT16 )( MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SLOT_HEIGHT ) * ( iCurrentSlot % ( MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) ) );
00353 
00354       // CENTER IN SLOT!
00355       sCenX = sX + ( abs( MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS - usWidth ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
00356       sCenY = sY + ( abs( MAP_INVEN_SLOT_HEIGHT - 5 - usHeight ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetY;
00357 
00358 
00359       if( fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ iCurrentSlot ] )
00360       {
00361             sOutLine = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) );
00362     fOutLine = TRUE;
00363       }
00364       else
00365       {
00366             sOutLine = us16BPPItemCyclePlacedItemColors[ 0 ];
00367     fOutLine = FALSE;
00368       }
00369 
00370       SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00371 
00372   INVRenderItem( guiSAVEBUFFER, NULL, &(pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o), 
00373                  (INT16)(sX + 7), sY, 60, 25, DIRTYLEVEL2, NULL, 0, fOutLine, sOutLine );//67
00374 
00375       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0,0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00376 
00377 
00378       // now blit this object in the box
00379       //BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.usItem ]) ), 
00380       //    Item[ pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.usItem ].ubGraphicNum, 
00381       //    sCenX, sCenY,
00382        //sOutLine, TRUE );
00383 
00384 
00385 
00386 
00387       // now draw bar for condition
00388       // Display ststus
00389       DrawItemUIBarEx( &( pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o ), 0, 
00390             (INT16)( ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_INV_POOL_OFFSET_X + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS ) * ( iCurrentSlot / MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) ), 
00391             ( INT16 )( ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_INV_POOL_OFFSET_Y + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SLOT_HEIGHT ) * ( iCurrentSlot % ( MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) ) )
00392             , ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_WIDTH_INV_POOL, ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_HEIGHT_INV_POOL,  Get16BPPColor( DESC_STATUS_BAR ), Get16BPPColor( DESC_STATUS_BAR_SHADOW ), TRUE, guiSAVEBUFFER );
00393 
00394 
00395       //
00396       // if the item is not reachable, or if the selected merc is not in the current sector
00397       //
00398       if( !( pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE ) ||
00399                   !(( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorX == sSelMapX ) &&
00400                         ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorY == sSelMapY ) &&
00401                         ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].bSectorZ == iCurrentMapSectorZ )
00402                   ) )
00403       {
00404             //Shade the item
00405             DrawHatchOnInventory( guiSAVEBUFFER, sX, sY, MAP_INVEN_SLOT_WIDTH, MAP_INVEN_SLOT_IMAGE_HEIGHT );
00406       }
00407 
00408 
00409       // the name
00410 
00411       wcscpy( sString, ShortItemNames[ pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.usItem ] );
00412 
00413       if( StringPixLength( sString, MAP_IVEN_FONT ) >= ( MAP_INVEN_SLOT_WIDTH ) )
00414       {
00415             ReduceStringLength( sString, ( INT16 )( MAP_INVEN_SLOT_WIDTH - StringPixLength( L" ...", MAP_IVEN_FONT ) ), MAP_IVEN_FONT );
00416       }
00417 
00418       FindFontCenterCoordinates( (INT16)( 4 + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS ) * ( iCurrentSlot / MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) ),
00419             0, MAP_INVEN_SLOT_WIDTH, 0, 
00420             sString, MAP_IVEN_FONT, 
00421             &sWidth, &sHeight );
00422 
00423       SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0,0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00424 
00425       SetFont( MAP_IVEN_FONT );
00426       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00427       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00428 
00429       mprintf( sWidth, 
00430             ( INT16 )( 3 + ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_INV_POOL_OFFSET_Y + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SLOT_HEIGHT ) * ( iCurrentSlot % ( MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) ) )
00431       , sString );
00432 
00433 /*
00434       if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.ubNumberOfObjects > 1 )
00435       {
00436             swprintf( sString, L"x%d",  pInventoryPoolList[ iCurrentSlot + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.ubNumberOfObjects );
00437 
00438             // find font right coord
00439             FindFontRightCoordinates( ( INT16 )( ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_INV_POOL_OFFSET_X + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X - 1 + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS ) * ( iCurrentSlot / MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) ),0, MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS - 10, 0, sString, MAP_IVEN_FONT, &sX, &sY );
00440       
00441             sY = ( INT16 )( 3 + ITEMDESC_ITEM_STATUS_INV_POOL_OFFSET_Y + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y + ( ( MAP_INVEN_SLOT_HEIGHT ) * ( iCurrentSlot % ( MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) ) ) ) - 7;
00442       
00443             // print string
00444             mprintf( sX, sY, sString );
00445       }
00446 */
00447 
00448       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0,0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00449 
00450       return( TRUE );
00451 }

00454 void UpdateHelpTextForInvnentoryStashSlots( void )
00455 {
00456       CHAR16 pStr[ 512 ];
00457       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00458       INT32 iFirstSlotOnPage = ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT );
00459       
00460       
00461       // run through list of items in slots and update help text for mouse regions
00462       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00463       {
00464                   if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 ) 
00465                   {
00466                         GetHelpTextForItem( (INT16 *)pStr , &( pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o ), NULL );
00467                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &(MapInventoryPoolSlots[ iCounter ] ), pStr );
00468                         
00469                         /*
00470                         // set text for current item
00471                         if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.usItem == MONEY )
00472                         {
00473                               swprintf( pStr, L"$%ld", pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.uiMoneyAmount );
00474                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(MapInventoryPoolSlots[ iCounter ]), pStr );
00475                         }
00476                         else
00477                         {
00478                               SetRegionFastHelpText( &(MapInventoryPoolSlots[ iCounter ]), ItemNames[ pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter + iFirstSlotOnPage ].o.usItem ] );
00479                         }
00480                         */
00481                   }
00482                   else
00483                   {
00484                         //OK, for each item, set dirty text if applicable!
00485                         SetRegionFastHelpText( &(MapInventoryPoolSlots[ iCounter ]), L"" );
00486                   }
00487       }
00488 
00489       return;
00490 }

00494 // create and remove buttons for inventory
00495 void CreateDestroyMapInventoryPoolButtons( BOOLEAN fExitFromMapScreen )
00496 {
00497       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
00498 
00499 /* player can leave items underground, no?
00500       if( iCurrentMapSectorZ )
00501       {
00502             fShowMapInventoryPool = FALSE;
00503       }
00504 */
00505 
00506       if( ( fShowMapInventoryPool ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
00507       {
00508             if( ( gWorldSectorX == sSelMapX ) && ( gWorldSectorY == sSelMapY ) && ( gbWorldSectorZ == iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
00509             {
00510                   // handle all reachable before save
00511                   HandleAllReachAbleItemsInTheSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00512             }
00513 
00514             // destroy buttons for map border
00515             DeleteMapBorderButtons( );
00516 
00517             fCreated = TRUE;
00518 
00519             // also create the inventory slot
00520             CreateMapInventoryPoolSlots( );
00521 
00522             // create buttons
00523             CreateMapInventoryButtons( );
00524 
00525             // build stash
00526             BuildStashForSelectedSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT16 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ) );
00527 
00528             CreateMapInventoryPoolDoneButton( );
00529 
00530             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00531             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00532       }
00533       else if( ( fShowMapInventoryPool == FALSE ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
00534       {
00535 
00536             // check fi we are in fact leaving mapscreen
00537             if( fExitFromMapScreen == FALSE )
00538             {
00539                   // recreate mapborder buttons
00540                   CreateButtonsForMapBorder( );
00541             }
00542             fCreated = FALSE;
00543 
00544             // destroy the map inventory slots
00545             DestroyMapInventoryPoolSlots( );
00546 
00547             // destroy map inventory buttons
00548             DestroyMapInventoryButtons( );
00549 
00550             DestroyInventoryPoolDoneButton( );
00551 
00552             // clear up unseen list
00553             ClearUpTempUnSeenList( );
00554 
00555             // now save results
00556             SaveSeenAndUnseenItems( );
00557 
00558             DestroyStash( );
00559 
00560             
00561 
00562             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00563             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00564             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00565 
00566             //DEF: added to remove the 'item blip' from staying on the radar map
00567             iCurrentlyHighLightedItem = -1;
00568 
00569             // re render radar map
00570             RenderRadarScreen( );
00571       }
00572 
00573       // do our handling here
00574       HandleMapSectorInventory( );
00575 
00576 }
00577 
00578 
00579 void CancelSectorInventoryDisplayIfOn( BOOLEAN fExitFromMapScreen )
00580 {
00581       if ( fShowMapInventoryPool )
00582       {
00583             // get rid of sector inventory mode & buttons
00584             fShowMapInventoryPool = FALSE;
00585             CreateDestroyMapInventoryPoolButtons( fExitFromMapScreen );
00586       }
00587 }

00590 
00591 void ClearUpTempUnSeenList( void )
00592 {
00593       // save these items and all the others
00594       if( pUnSeenItems == NULL )
00595       {
00596             return;
00597       }
00598 
00599       // build the list based on this 
00600       pSaveList = pUnSeenItems;
00601       pUnSeenItems = NULL;
00602 
00603       return;
00604 }
00605 
00606 void SaveSeenAndUnseenItems( void )
00607 {
00608       WORLDITEM *pSeenItemsList = NULL;
00609       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00610       INT32 iItemCount = 0;
00611       INT32 iTotalNumberItems = 0;
00612 
00613       // allocate space
00614       iTotalNumberItems = GetTotalNumberOfItems( );
00615 
00616       // if there are seen items, build a temp world items list of them and save them
00617       if( iTotalNumberItems > 0 )
00618       {
00619             pSeenItemsList = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( ( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * ( iTotalNumberItems ) )  );
00620 
00621             // copy
00622             for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iTotalNumberOfSlots; iCounter++ )
00623             {
00624                   if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
00625                   {
00626                         // copy object stuff
00627                         memcpy( &( pSeenItemsList[ iItemCount ] ), &( pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
00628 
00629                         // check if item actually lives at a gridno
00630                         // if not, check predicessor, iItemCount is not 0
00631                         if( pSeenItemsList[ iItemCount ].sGridNo == 0 )
00632                         {
00633                               if( iItemCount > 0 )
00634                               {
00635                                     // borrow from predicessor
00636                                     pSeenItemsList[ iItemCount ].sGridNo = pSeenItemsList[ iItemCount - 1 ].sGridNo;
00637                               }
00638                               else
00639                               {
00640                                     // get entry grid location
00641                               }
00642                         }
00643                         pSeenItemsList[ iItemCount ].fExists = TRUE;
00644                         pSeenItemsList[ iItemCount ].bVisible = TRUE;
00645                         iItemCount++;
00646                   }
00647             }
00648       }
00649 
00650       // if this is the loaded sector handle here
00651       if( ( gWorldSectorX == sSelMapX ) && ( gWorldSectorY == sSelMapY ) && ( gbWorldSectorZ == ( INT8 ) ( iCurrentMapSectorZ ) ) )
00652       {
00653             ReBuildWorldItemStashForLoadedSector( iItemCount, uiNumberOfUnSeenItems, pSeenItemsList, pSaveList );
00654       }
00655       else
00656       {
00657             // now copy over unseen and seen
00658             if( uiNumberOfUnSeenItems > 0 )
00659             {
00660                   // over write file and copy unseen
00661                   AddWorldItemsToUnLoadedSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ), 0, uiNumberOfUnSeenItems, pSaveList, TRUE );
00662 
00663                   // check if seen items exist too
00664                   if( iItemCount > 0 )
00665                   {
00666                         AddWorldItemsToUnLoadedSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ), 0, iItemCount, pSeenItemsList, FALSE );
00667                   }
00668 
00669             }
00670             else if( iItemCount > 0 )
00671             {
00672                   // copy only seen items
00673                   AddWorldItemsToUnLoadedSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ), 0, iItemCount, pSeenItemsList, TRUE );
00674             }
00675             else
00676             {
00677                   // get rid of the file
00678                   SaveWorldItemsToTempItemFile( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ), 0, NULL );
00679                   return;
00680             }
00681       }
00682 
00683       // now clear out seen list
00684       if( pSeenItemsList != NULL )
00685       {
00686             MemFree( pSeenItemsList );
00687             pSeenItemsList = NULL;
00688       }
00689 
00690       // clear out unseen list
00691       if( pSaveList != NULL )
00692       {
00693             MemFree( pSaveList );
00694             pSaveList = NULL;
00695       }
00696 
00697       uiNumberOfUnSeenItems = 0;
00698       iItemCount = 0;
00699 }

00703 // the screen mask bttn callaback...to disable the inventory and lock out the map itself
00704 void MapInvenPoolScreenMaskCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00705 {
00706 
00707       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP ) )
00708       {
00709             fShowMapInventoryPool = FALSE;
00710       }
00711 
00712       return;
00713 }
00714 
00715 
00716 void CreateMapInventoryPoolSlots( void )
00717 {
00718       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00719       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
00720       INT16 sXA = 0, sYA = 0;
00721       INT16 sULX = 0, sULY = 0;
00722       INT16 sBRX = 0, sBRY = 0;
00723 
00724       // WANNE 2
00725       //MSYS_DefineRegion( &MapInventoryPoolMask, 
00726       //          MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X, 0, 640, 360,
00727       //          MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MapInvenPoolScreenMaskCallback);
00728 
00729       MSYS_DefineRegion( &MapInventoryPoolMask, 
00730                   MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH - MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X, SCREEN_HEIGHT - 120,
00731                   MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MapInvenPoolScreenMaskCallback);
00732 
00733       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00734       {
00735             sX = ( iCounter / MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS );
00736             sY = ( iCounter % ( MAP_INV_SLOT_COLS ) );
00737 
00738             sXA = sX + 1;
00739             sYA = sY + 1;
00740 
00741             sULX = MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X + 4;
00742             sULY = MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y + 1;
00743 
00744             sULX += ( INT16 ) ( sX * MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS  );
00745             sULY += ( INT16 ) ( ( sY * MAP_INVEN_SLOT_HEIGHT ) );
00746 
00747             sBRX = ( INT16 ) ( MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X + ( sXA * MAP_INVEN_SPACE_BTWN_SLOTS ) );
00748             sBRY = ( INT16 ) ( MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y + ( sYA * MAP_INVEN_SLOT_HEIGHT ) ) - 1;
00749 
00750             MSYS_DefineRegion( &MapInventoryPoolSlots[ iCounter ], 
00751                   sULX, sULY, sBRX, sBRY,
00752                   MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MapInvenPoolSlotsMove, MapInvenPoolSlots );
00753 
00754             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &MapInventoryPoolSlots[iCounter], 0, iCounter );
00755 
00756       }
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 void DestroyMapInventoryPoolSlots( void )
00761 {
00762       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00763 
00764       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT; iCounter++ )
00765       {
00766             MSYS_RemoveRegion(  &MapInventoryPoolSlots[ iCounter ] );
00767       }
00768 
00769       // remove map inventory mask
00770       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &MapInventoryPoolMask );
00771 
00772 }
00773 
00774 void MapInvenPoolSlotsMove( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason  )
00775 {
00776       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00777 
00778 
00779       iCounter = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00780 
00781       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
00782       {
00783             iCurrentlyHighLightedItem = iCounter;
00784             fChangedInventorySlots = TRUE;
00785             gfCheckForCursorOverMapSectorInventoryItem = TRUE;
00786       }
00787       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00788       {
00789             iCurrentlyHighLightedItem = -1;
00790             fChangedInventorySlots = TRUE;
00791             gfCheckForCursorOverMapSectorInventoryItem = FALSE;
00792             
00793             // re render radar map
00794             RenderRadarScreen( );
00795       }
00796 }
00797 
00798 
00799 void MapInvenPoolSlots(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00800 {
00801       // btn callback handler for assignment screen mask region
00802       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00803       UINT16 usOldItemIndex, usNewItemIndex;
00804       INT16 sGridNo = 0;
00805       INT32 iOldNumberOfObjects = 0;
00806       INT16 sDistanceFromObject = 0;
00807       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00808       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
00809 
00810       iCounter = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00811 
00812       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP ) )
00813       {
00814             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00815             {
00816                   fShowMapInventoryPool = FALSE;
00817             } 
00818             // else do nothing
00819       }
00820       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00821       {
00822             // check if item in cursor, if so, then swap, and no item in curor, pick up, if item in cursor but not box, put in box
00823 
00824             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00825             {
00826                   // Return if empty
00827                   if ( pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].o.usItem == NOTHING )
00828                         return;
00829             }
00830 
00831             
00832 
00833             // is this item reachable
00834             if( !(  pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE ) )
00835             {
00836                   if ( pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].o.usItem != NOTHING )
00837                   {
00838                         // not reachable
00839                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)gzLateLocalizedString[38], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00840                         return;
00841                   }
00842             }
00843 
00844 
00845             // check if selected merc is in this sector, if not, warn them and leave
00846             
00847             // valid character?
00848             if( gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].fValid == FALSE )
00849             {
00850                   DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pMapInventoryErrorString[ 1 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00851                   return;
00852             }
00853 
00854       
00855 
00856             //if( fShowInventoryFlag )
00857             {
00858                   // not in sector?
00859                   if( ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorX != sSelMapX ) ||
00860                               ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].sSectorY != sSelMapY ) ||
00861                               ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].bSectorZ != iCurrentMapSectorZ ) ||
00862                               ( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].fBetweenSectors ) )
00863                   {
00864                         if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00865                         {
00866                               swprintf( sString, pMapInventoryErrorString[ 2 ], Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].name );
00867                         }
00868                         else
00869                         {
00870                               swprintf( sString, pMapInventoryErrorString[ 5 ], Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].name );
00871                         }
00872                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)sString, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00873                         return;
00874                   }
00875             }
00876             
00877 
00878             // If we do not have an item in hand, start moving it
00879             if ( gpItemPointer == NULL )
00880             {
00881 
00882                   
00883                   // Return if empty
00884                   if ( pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].o.usItem == NOTHING )
00885                         return;
00886 
00887                   // if in battle inform player they will have to do this in tactical
00888 //                if( ( ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector ) ||( ( sSelMapX == gWorldSectorX ) && ( sSelMapY == gWorldSectorY ) && ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) ) )
00889                   if( !CanPlayerUseSectorInventory( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ] ) )
00890                   {
00891                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pMapInventoryErrorString[ 3 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00892                         return;
00893                   }
00894 
00895                   sObjectSourceGridNo = pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].sGridNo;
00896 
00897                   // check if this is the loaded sector, if so, then notify player, can't do anything
00898                   if( ( sSelMapX == gWorldSectorX )&&( gWorldSectorY == sSelMapY ) &&(gbWorldSectorZ == iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
00899                   {
00900                         // notify
00901                         pSoldier = &( Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ] );
00902 
00903                         sDistanceFromObject = PythSpacesAway( sObjectSourceGridNo, pSoldier -> sGridNo);
00904 
00905                   /*    if( sDistanceFromObject > MAX_DISTANCE_TO_PICKUP_ITEM )
00906                         {
00907                               // see for the loaded sector if the merc is cloase enough?
00908                               swprintf( sString, pMapInventoryErrorString[ 0 ], Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ].name ); 
00909                               DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, sString, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00910                               return;
00911                         }
00912                         */
00913                   }
00914 
00915                   BeginInventoryPoolPtr( &( pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].o ) );
00916             }
00917             else
00918             {
00919 
00920                   // if in battle inform player they will have to do this in tactical
00921 //                if( ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector ) ||( ( sSelMapX == gWorldSectorX ) && ( sSelMapY == gWorldSectorY ) && ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) )
00922                   if( !CanPlayerUseSectorInventory( &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ] ) )
00923                   {
00924                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)pMapInventoryErrorString[ 4 ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00925                         return;
00926                   }
00927 
00928                   usOldItemIndex = pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].o.usItem;
00929                   usNewItemIndex = gpItemPointer->usItem; 
00930                   iOldNumberOfObjects =  pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
00931                   
00932                   
00933                   // Else, try to place here
00934                   if ( PlaceObjectInInventoryStash( &( pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].o ), gpItemPointer ) )
00935                   {
00936 
00937                         // set as reachable and set gridno
00938                         pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_REACHABLE;
00939                         
00940                         // if loaded sector, grab grid no of dropping soldier 
00941                         //if( ( sSelMapX == gWorldSectorX )&&( gWorldSectorY == sSelMapY ) &&(gbWorldSectorZ == iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
00942                         //{
00943                               // nothing here before, then place here
00944                               if( iOldNumberOfObjects == 0 )
00945                               {
00946                                     if( sObjectSourceGridNo == NOWHERE )
00947                                     {
00948                                           pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT;
00949                                           pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].sGridNo = sObjectSourceGridNo;
00950                                     }
00951                                     else
00952                                     {
00953                                           pInventoryPoolList[ ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) + iCounter ].sGridNo = sObjectSourceGridNo;
00954                                     }
00955                               }
00956                         //}
00957 
00958                         // Check if it's the same now!
00959                         if ( gpItemPointer->ubNumberOfObjects == 0 )
00960                         {
00961                               MAPEndItemPointer( );
00962                         }
00963                         else
00964                         {
00965                               // update ptr
00966                               // now set the cursor
00967                               guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
00968                               gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
00969       
00970                               fMapInventoryItem = TRUE;
00971                               MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
00972                               SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( EXTERN_CURSOR );
00973                         }
00974 
00975 /*
00976                         if ( fShowInventoryFlag && bSelectedInfoChar >= 0 )
00977                         {
00978                               ReevaluateItemHatches( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], FALSE );
00979                         }
00980                         */
00981                   }
00982             }
00983 
00984             // dirty region, force update
00985             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00986 
00987       }
00988 }

00992       guiMapInvenButtonImage[ 0 ]=  LoadButtonImage( "INTERFACE\\map_screen_bottom_arrows.sti" , 10, 1, -1, 3, -1 );

00994                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00995                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)MapInventoryPoolNextBtn );

00999   guiMapInvenButton[ 1 ] = QuickCreateButton( guiMapInvenButtonImage[ 1 ], (MAP_INV_X_OFFSET + 487), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 144),
01000                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
01001                                                             (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)MapInventoryPoolPrevBtn );

01023 
01024 void BuildStashForSelectedSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sMapZ )
01025 {
01026       INT32 iSize = 0;
01027       OBJECTTYPE *pTempList = NULL;
01028       UINT32 uiItemCount = 0;
01029       UINT32 uiTotalNumberOfItems = 0, uiTotalNumberOfRealItems = 0;
01030       WORLDITEM * pTotalSectorList = NULL;
01031       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01032       UINT32      uiTotalNumberOfSeenItems=0;
01033       
01034 //    #ifdef _DEBUG
01035             BOOLEAN fReturn = TRUE;
01036 //    #endif
01037 
01038       // get size of the current stash in sector (count stacks as one item)
01039       iSize = GetSizeOfStashInSector( sMapX, sMapY, sMapZ, TRUE );
01040 
01041       // round off .. we want at least 1 free page of space...
01042       iSize = ( iSize - ( iSize % MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) ) + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT;
01043 
01044       iTotalNumberOfSlots = iSize;
01045 
01046       // allocate space for list
01047       pInventoryPoolList = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iSize );
01048 
01049       memset( pInventoryPoolList, 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iSize ); 
01050 
01051       iLastInventoryPoolPage = ( ( iTotalNumberOfSlots - 1 ) / MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT );
01052 
01053 
01054       uiNumberOfUnSeenItems = 0;
01055 
01056       // now laod these items into memory, based on fact if sector is in fact loaded
01057       if( ( sMapX == gWorldSectorX )&&( gWorldSectorY == sMapY ) &&(gbWorldSectorZ == sMapZ ) )
01058       {
01059             // sector loaded, just copy from list
01060             for( iCounter = 0; ( UINT32 )( iCounter ) < guiNumWorldItems; iCounter++ )
01061             {
01062                   // check if visible, if so, then copy over object type
01063                   // if visible to player, then state fact
01064 
01065 /*
01066                   if( gWorldItems[ iCounter].bVisible == 1 && 
01067                               gWorldItems[ iCounter ].fExists && 
01068                               gWorldItems[ iCounter ].o.usItem != SWITCH && 
01069                               gWorldItems[ iCounter ].o.bTrap <= 0 )
01070 */
01071                   if( IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( &gWorldItems[ iCounter ] ) )
01072                   {
01073                         // one more item
01074                         memcpy( &( pInventoryPoolList[ uiItemCount ] ), &( gWorldItems[ iCounter ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01075                         uiItemCount++;
01076                   }
01077             }
01078 
01079 
01080             uiTotalNumberOfSeenItems = uiItemCount;
01081 
01082 
01083                   // now allocate space for all the unseen items
01084             if( guiNumWorldItems > uiItemCount )
01085             {
01086                   pUnSeenItems = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( ( guiNumWorldItems - uiItemCount ) * sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01087 
01088                   uiItemCount = 0;
01089 
01090                   // now copy over
01091                   for( iCounter = 0; ( UINT32 )iCounter < guiNumWorldItems; iCounter++ )
01092                   {
01093 //                      if( ( gWorldItems[ iCounter ].bVisible  != 1 ) && 
01094 //                                  ( gWorldItems[ iCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 ) && 
01095 //                                        gWorldItems[ iCounter ].fExists )
01096                         if( IsMapScreenWorldItemInvisibleInMapInventory( &gWorldItems[ iCounter ] ) )
01097                         {
01098                               // one more item
01099                               memcpy( &( pUnSeenItems[ uiItemCount ] ), &( gWorldItems[ iCounter ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01100 
01101                               uiItemCount++;
01102                         }
01103                   }
01104 
01105                   // copy over number of unseen
01106                   uiNumberOfUnSeenItems = uiItemCount;
01107             }
01108       }
01109       else
01110       {
01111             // not loaded, load
01112             // get total number, visable and invisible
01113             fReturn = GetNumberOfWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 )( sMapZ ), &( uiTotalNumberOfItems ), FALSE );
01114             Assert( fReturn );
01115 
01116             fReturn = GetNumberOfActiveWorldItemsFromTempFile( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 )( sMapZ ), &( uiTotalNumberOfRealItems ) );
01117             Assert( fReturn );
01118             
01119             if( uiTotalNumberOfRealItems > 0 )
01120             {
01121                   // allocate space for the list
01122                   pTotalSectorList = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiTotalNumberOfItems );
01123             
01124                   
01125                   // now load into mem
01126                   LoadWorldItemsFromTempItemFile(  sMapX,  sMapY, ( INT8 ) ( sMapZ ), pTotalSectorList );
01127 
01128             }
01129 
01130 
01131             // now run through list and 
01132             for( iCounter = 0; ( UINT32 )( iCounter )< uiTotalNumberOfRealItems; iCounter++ )
01133             {
01134                   // if visible to player, then state fact
01135 /*
01136                   if( pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].bVisible == 1 && 
01137                               pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].fExists &&
01138                               pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].o.usItem != SWITCH && 
01139                               pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].o.bTrap <= 0 )
01140 */
01141 
01142 
01143                   //TEST!!  If the item exists, and is NOT VALID, report it
01144                   if( pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].fExists &&  pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].o.usItem > MAXITEMS )
01145                   {
01146                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"The %d item in the list is NOT valid. Please send save.  DF 1.", iCounter );
01147                   }
01148 
01149 
01150                   if( IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( &pTotalSectorList[ iCounter] ) )
01151                   {
01152                         // one more item
01153                         memcpy( &( pInventoryPoolList[ uiItemCount ] ), &( pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01154 
01155                         uiItemCount++;
01156                   }
01157             }
01158             
01159             uiTotalNumberOfSeenItems = uiItemCount;
01160 
01161             // now allocate space for all the unseen items
01162             if( uiTotalNumberOfRealItems > uiItemCount )
01163             {
01164                   pUnSeenItems = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( ( uiTotalNumberOfRealItems - uiItemCount ) * sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01165 
01166                   uiItemCount = 0;
01167 
01168                   // now copy over
01169                   for( iCounter = 0; ( UINT32 )iCounter < uiTotalNumberOfItems; iCounter++ )
01170                   {
01171 /*
01172                         if( ( pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].bVisible  != 1 ) && 
01173                                     ( pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].o.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 ) && 
01174                                           pTotalSectorList[ iCounter].fExists ) 
01175 */
01176                         if( IsMapScreenWorldItemInvisibleInMapInventory( &pTotalSectorList[ iCounter] ) )
01177                         {
01178                               // one more item
01179                               memcpy( &( pUnSeenItems[ uiItemCount ] ), &( pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01180 
01181                               uiItemCount++;
01182                         }
01183                   }
01184 
01185                   // copy over number of unseen
01186                   uiNumberOfUnSeenItems = uiItemCount;
01187             }
01188 
01189             // if anything was alloced, then get rid of it
01190             if( uiTotalNumberOfRealItems > 0 )
01191             {
01192                         MemFree( pTotalSectorList );
01193             }
01194       }
01195 
01196       //Check to see if any of the items in the list have a gridno of NOWHERE and the entry point flag NOT set
01197       CheckGridNoOfItemsInMapScreenMapInventory();
01198 
01199       //Sort the sector invenrtory
01200       SortSectorInventory( pInventoryPoolList, uiTotalNumberOfSeenItems );
01201 }
01202 
01203 void ReBuildWorldItemStashForLoadedSector( INT32 iNumberSeenItems, INT32 iNumberUnSeenItems, WORLDITEM *pSeenItemsList, WORLDITEM *pUnSeenItemsList )
01204 {
01205       INT32 iTotalNumberOfItems = 0;
01206       INT32 iCurrentItem = 0;
01207       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01208       INT32 iRemainder = 0;
01209       UINT32      uiTotalNumberOfVisibleItems=0;
01210       WORLDITEM * pTotalList = NULL;
01211 
01212       // clear out the list
01213       TrashWorldItems( );
01214 
01215       // get total number of items
01216       iTotalNumberOfItems = iNumberUnSeenItems + iNumberSeenItems;
01217 
01218       iRemainder = iTotalNumberOfItems % 10;
01219 
01220       // if there is a remainder, then add onto end of list
01221       if( iRemainder )
01222       {
01223             iTotalNumberOfItems += 10 - iRemainder; 
01224       }
01225 
01226       // allocate space for items
01227       pTotalList = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iTotalNumberOfItems );
01228       
01229       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iTotalNumberOfItems; iCounter++ )
01230       {
01231             // clear out the structure
01232             memset( &( pTotalList[ iCounter ] ), 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01233       }
01234 
01235       // place seen items in the world
01236       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberSeenItems; iCounter++ )
01237       {
01238             memcpy( &( pTotalList[ iCurrentItem ] ), &( pSeenItemsList[ iCounter ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01239             iCurrentItem++;
01240       }
01241 
01242       // now store the unseen item list
01243       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberUnSeenItems; iCounter++ )
01244       {
01245             memcpy( &( pTotalList[ iCurrentItem ] ), &( pUnSeenItemsList[ iCounter ] ), sizeof( WORLDITEM ) );
01246             iCurrentItem++;
01247       }
01248 
01249       RefreshItemPools( pTotalList, iTotalNumberOfItems );
01250 
01251       //Count the total number of visible items
01252       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberSeenItems; iCounter++ )
01253       {
01254             uiTotalNumberOfVisibleItems += pSeenItemsList[ iCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
01255       }
01256 
01257       //reset the visible item count in the sector info struct
01258       SetNumberOfVisibleWorldItemsInSectorStructureForSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ , uiTotalNumberOfVisibleItems );
01259 
01260       // clear out allocated space for total list
01261       MemFree( pTotalList );
01262 
01263       // reset total list
01264       pTotalList = NULL;
01265 
01266       return;
01267 }
01268 
01269 void ReSizeStashListByThisAmount( INT32 iNumberOfItems )
01270 {
01271       INT32 iSizeOfList = iTotalNumberOfSlots;
01272       WORLDITEM * pOldList;
01273 
01274       // no items added, leave
01275       if( iNumberOfItems == 0 )
01276       {
01277             return;
01278       }
01279 
01280       iTotalNumberOfSlots+= iNumberOfItems;
01281 
01282       pOldList = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iSizeOfList );
01283       memset( pOldList, 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iSizeOfList );
01284 
01285       memcpy( pOldList, pInventoryPoolList, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iSizeOfList );
01286 
01287       // rebuild stash 
01288       pInventoryPoolList = (WORLDITEM *) MemRealloc( pInventoryPoolList, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iTotalNumberOfSlots );
01289       
01290       // set new mem to 0
01291       memset( pInventoryPoolList, 0, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iTotalNumberOfSlots );
01292 
01293       // copy old info over
01294       memcpy( pInventoryPoolList, pOldList, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * iSizeOfList );
01295       
01296       // free memeory
01297       MemFree( pOldList );
01298 
01299       return;
01300 }
01301 
01302 void DestroyStash( void )
01303 {
01304       // clear out stash
01305       MemFree( pInventoryPoolList );
01306 
01307 }
01308

01310 
01311 INT32 GetSizeOfStashInSector( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY, INT16 sMapZ, BOOLEAN fCountStacksAsOne )
01312 {
01313       // get # of items in sector that are visible to the player
01314       UINT32 uiTotalNumberOfItems = 0, uiTotalNumberOfRealItems = 0;
01315       WORLDITEM * pTotalSectorList = NULL;
01316       UINT32 uiItemCount = 0;
01317       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01318       BOOLEAN fReturn = TRUE;
01319 
01320       if( ( sMapX == gWorldSectorX ) && ( sMapY == gWorldSectorY) && ( sMapZ == gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01321       {
01322             uiTotalNumberOfItems = guiNumWorldItems;
01323 
01324             // now run through list and 
01325             for( iCounter = 0; ( UINT32 )( iCounter )< uiTotalNumberOfItems; iCounter++ )
01326             {
01327                   // if visible to player, then state fact
01328 //                if( gWorldItems[ iCounter ].bVisible == 1 && gWorldItems[ iCounter ].fExists )
01329                   if( IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( &gWorldItems[ iCounter ] ) )
01330                   {
01331                         // add it
01332                         if ( fCountStacksAsOne )
01333                         {
01334                               uiItemCount++;
01335                         }
01336                         else
01337                         {
01338                               uiItemCount += gWorldItems[ iCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
01339                         }
01340                   }
01341             }
01342       }
01343       else
01344       {
01345             // get total number, visable and invisible
01346             fReturn = GetNumberOfActiveWorldItemsFromTempFile( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 )( sMapZ ), &( uiTotalNumberOfRealItems ) );
01347             Assert( fReturn );
01348 
01349             fReturn = GetNumberOfWorldItemsFromTempItemFile( sMapX, sMapY, ( INT8 )( sMapZ ), &( uiTotalNumberOfItems ), FALSE );
01350             Assert( fReturn );
01351 
01352             if( uiTotalNumberOfItems > 0 )
01353             {
01354                   // allocate space for the list
01355                   pTotalSectorList = (WORLDITEM *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiTotalNumberOfItems );
01356 
01357                         // now load into mem
01358                   LoadWorldItemsFromTempItemFile(  sMapX,  sMapY, ( INT8 ) ( sMapZ ), pTotalSectorList );
01359             }
01360 
01361             // now run through list and 
01362             for( iCounter = 0; ( UINT32 )( iCounter )< uiTotalNumberOfRealItems; iCounter++ )
01363             {
01364                   // if visible to player, then state fact
01365 //                if( pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ].bVisible == 1 && pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ].fExists )
01366                   if( IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( &pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ] ) )
01367                   {
01368                         // add it
01369                         if ( fCountStacksAsOne )
01370                         {
01371                               uiItemCount++;
01372                         }
01373                         else
01374                         {
01375                               uiItemCount += pTotalSectorList[ iCounter ].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
01376                         }
01377                   }
01378             }
01379             
01380             // if anything was alloced, then get rid of it
01381             if( pTotalSectorList != NULL )
01382             {
01383                   MemFree( pTotalSectorList );
01384                   pTotalSectorList = NULL;
01385 
01386                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION   
01387                   if( uiTotalNumberOfItems == 0 )
01388                   {
01389                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"pTotalSectorList is NOT NULL when uiTotalNumberOfRealItems is %d.", uiTotalNumberOfRealItems );
01390                   }
01391                   #endif
01392             }
01393       }
01394 
01395 
01396       return( uiItemCount );
01397 }

01400 
01401 void BeginInventoryPoolPtr( OBJECTTYPE *pInventorySlot )
01402 {
01403       BOOLEAN fOk = FALSE;
01404       BOOLEAN fSELLALL = gGameExternalOptions.fSellAll;
01405       INT16 iPriceModifier = gGameExternalOptions.iPriceModifier;
01406 
01407       // If not null return
01408       if ( gpItemPointer != NULL )
01409       {
01410             return;
01411       }
01412 
01413       // if shift key get all
01414 
01415       if (_KeyDown( SHIFT ))
01416       {
01417             // Remove all from soldier's slot
01418             fOk = RemoveObjectFromStashSlot( pInventorySlot, &gItemPointer );
01419       }
01420       else
01421       {
01422             GetObjFromInventoryStashSlot( pInventorySlot, &gItemPointer );
01423             fOk = (gItemPointer.ubNumberOfObjects == 1);
01424       }
01425 
01426       if (fOk)
01427       {
01428             // Dirty interface
01429             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01430             gpItemPointer = &gItemPointer;
01431 
01432             if ( _KeyDown ( CTRL ))
01433             {
01434                   gpItemPointer = NULL;
01435                   fMapInventoryItem = FALSE;
01436                   if ( fShowMapInventoryPool )
01437                         HandleButtonStatesWhileMapInventoryActive();
01438             }
01439             else if ( _KeyDown ( ALT ) && fSELLALL)
01440             {
01441 
01442                   INT32 iPrice = 0;
01443                   
01444                   if( gItemPointer.ubNumberOfObjects > 1)
01445                   {
01446                         if( Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_AMMO )
01447                         {
01448                               for (INT8 bLoop = 0; bLoop < gItemPointer.ubNumberOfObjects; bLoop++)
01449                               {
01450                                     iPrice += (INT32)( Item[gpItemPointer->usItem].usPrice * (float) gpItemPointer->ubShotsLeft[bLoop] / Magazine[ Item[gpItemPointer->usItem].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize );
01451                               }                             
01452                         }
01453                         else
01454                         {
01455                               for (INT8 bLoop = 0; bLoop < gItemPointer.ubNumberOfObjects; bLoop++)
01456                               {
01457                                     iPrice += (INT32)( Item[gpItemPointer->usItem].usPrice * (float)gpItemPointer->bStatus[bLoop] / 100 );
01458                               }
01459                         }
01460                   }
01461                   else
01462                   {
01463                         iPrice = ( Item[gpItemPointer->usItem].usPrice * gpItemPointer->bStatus[0] / 100 );
01464 
01465                         for (INT8 bLoop = 0; bLoop < MAX_ATTACHMENTS; bLoop++)
01466                         {
01467                               iPrice += (INT32) ( Item[gpItemPointer->usAttachItem[bLoop]].usPrice * (float)gpItemPointer->bAttachStatus[bLoop] / 100);
01468                         }
01469                   }
01470                   
01471                   if( iPriceModifier < 1) iPriceModifier = 1;
01472 
01473                   iPrice = (INT32) (iPrice / iPriceModifier);                 
01474                   
01475                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook( SOLD_ITEMS, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), iPrice );
01476                 PlayJA2Sample( COMPUTER_BEEP2_IN, RATE_11025, 15, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                             
01477                   gpItemPointer = NULL;
01478                   fMapInventoryItem = FALSE;
01479                   if ( fShowMapInventoryPool )
01480                         HandleButtonStatesWhileMapInventoryActive();
01481 
01482             }
01483             else
01484             {
01485                   gpItemPointerSoldier = NULL;
01486 
01487                   // now set the cursor
01488                   guiExternVo = GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( &(Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ]) );
01489                   gusExternVoSubIndex = Item[ gpItemPointer->usItem ].ubGraphicNum;
01490 
01491                   fMapInventoryItem = TRUE;
01492                   MSYS_ChangeRegionCursor( &gMPanelRegion , EXTERN_CURSOR );  
01493                   SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( EXTERN_CURSOR );
01494 
01495                   if ( fShowInventoryFlag && bSelectedInfoChar >= 0 )
01496                   {
01497                         ReevaluateItemHatches( MercPtrs[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ], FALSE );
01498                         fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01499                   }
01500             }
01501       }
01502 }
01503 
01504 // get this item out of the stash slot
01505 BOOLEAN GetObjFromInventoryStashSlot( OBJECTTYPE *pInventorySlot, OBJECTTYPE *pItemPtr )
01506 {
01507       // item ptr
01508       if (!pItemPtr )
01509       {
01510             return( FALSE );
01511       }
01512 
01513       // if there are only one item in slot, just copy
01514       if (pInventorySlot->ubNumberOfObjects == 1)
01515       {
01516             memcpy( pItemPtr, pInventorySlot, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01517             DeleteObj( pInventorySlot );  
01518       }
01519       else
01520       {
01521             // take one item
01522             pItemPtr->usItem = pInventorySlot->usItem;
01523 
01524             // find first unempty slot
01525             pItemPtr->bStatus[0] = pInventorySlot->bStatus[0];
01526             pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
01527             pItemPtr->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pItemPtr );
01528             RemoveObjFrom( pInventorySlot, 0 );
01529             pInventorySlot->ubWeight = CalculateObjectWeight( pInventorySlot );
01530 
01531       }
01532 
01533       return ( TRUE );
01534 }
01535 
01536 
01537 BOOLEAN RemoveObjectFromStashSlot( OBJECTTYPE *pInventorySlot, OBJECTTYPE *pItemPtr )
01538 {
01539 
01540       CHECKF( pInventorySlot );
01541 
01542       if (pInventorySlot -> ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
01543       {
01544             return( FALSE );
01545       }
01546       else
01547       {
01548             memcpy( pItemPtr, pInventorySlot, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01549             DeleteObj( pInventorySlot );
01550             return( TRUE );
01551       }
01552 }
01553 
01554 BOOLEAN PlaceObjectInInventoryStash( OBJECTTYPE *pInventorySlot, OBJECTTYPE *pItemPtr )
01555 {
01556       UINT8 ubNumberToDrop, ubSlotLimit, ubLoop;
01557 
01558       // if there is something there, swap it, if they are of the same type and stackable then add to the count
01559 
01560       ubSlotLimit = Item[pItemPtr -> usItem].ubPerPocket;
01561 
01562       if (pInventorySlot->ubNumberOfObjects == 0)
01563       {
01564             // placement in an empty slot
01565             ubNumberToDrop = pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects;
01566 
01567             if (ubNumberToDrop > ubSlotLimit && ubSlotLimit != 0)
01568             {
01569                   // drop as many as possible into pocket
01570                   ubNumberToDrop = ubSlotLimit;
01571             }
01572 
01573             // could be wrong type of object for slot... need to check...
01574             // but assuming it isn't
01575             memcpy( pInventorySlot, pItemPtr, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01576 
01577             if (ubNumberToDrop != pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects)
01578             {
01579                   // in the InSlot copy, zero out all the objects we didn't drop
01580                   for (ubLoop = ubNumberToDrop; ubLoop < pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects; ubLoop++)
01581                   {
01582                         pInventorySlot->bStatus[ubLoop] = 0;
01583                   }
01584             }
01585             pInventorySlot->ubNumberOfObjects = ubNumberToDrop;
01586 
01587             // remove a like number of objects from pObj
01588             RemoveObjs( pItemPtr, ubNumberToDrop );
01589       }
01590       else
01591       {
01592             // replacement/reloading/merging/stacking 
01593 
01594             // placement in an empty slot
01595             ubNumberToDrop = pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects;
01596 
01597             if (pItemPtr->usItem == pInventorySlot->usItem)
01598             {
01599                   if (pItemPtr->usItem == MONEY)
01600                   {
01601                         // always allow money to be combined!
01602                         // average out the status values using a weighted average...
01603                         pInventorySlot->bStatus[0] = (INT8) ( ( (UINT32)pInventorySlot->bMoneyStatus * pInventorySlot->uiMoneyAmount + (UINT32)pItemPtr->bMoneyStatus * pItemPtr->uiMoneyAmount )/ (pInventorySlot->uiMoneyAmount + pItemPtr->uiMoneyAmount) );
01604                         pInventorySlot->uiMoneyAmount += pItemPtr->uiMoneyAmount;
01605 
01606                         DeleteObj( pItemPtr );
01607                   }
01608                   else if (ubSlotLimit < 2)
01609                   {
01610                         // swapping
01611                         SwapObjs( pItemPtr, pInventorySlot );
01612                   }
01613                   else
01614                   {
01615                         // stacking
01616                         if( ubNumberToDrop > ubSlotLimit - pInventorySlot -> ubNumberOfObjects )
01617                         {
01618                               ubNumberToDrop = ubSlotLimit - pInventorySlot -> ubNumberOfObjects;
01619                         }
01620 
01621                         StackObjs( pItemPtr, pInventorySlot, ubNumberToDrop );
01622                   }
01623             }
01624             else
01625             {
01626                   
01627                         SwapObjs( pItemPtr, pInventorySlot );
01628             }
01629       }
01630       return( TRUE );
01631 }
01632 
01633 
01634 BOOLEAN AutoPlaceObjectInInventoryStash( OBJECTTYPE *pItemPtr )
01635 {
01636       UINT8 ubNumberToDrop, ubSlotLimit, ubLoop;
01637       OBJECTTYPE *pInventorySlot;
01638 
01639 
01640       // if there is something there, swap it, if they are of the same type and stackable then add to the count
01641       pInventorySlot =  &( pInventoryPoolList[ iTotalNumberOfSlots ].o );
01642       
01643       // placement in an empty slot
01644       ubNumberToDrop = pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects;
01645 
01646       ubSlotLimit = ItemSlotLimit( pItemPtr->usItem, BIGPOCK1POS );
01647 
01648       if (ubNumberToDrop > ubSlotLimit && ubSlotLimit != 0)
01649       {
01650             // drop as many as possible into pocket
01651             ubNumberToDrop = ubSlotLimit;
01652       }
01653 
01654       // could be wrong type of object for slot... need to check...
01655       // but assuming it isn't
01656       memcpy( pInventorySlot, pItemPtr, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
01657 
01658       if (ubNumberToDrop != pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects)
01659       {
01660             // in the InSlot copy, zero out all the objects we didn't drop
01661             for (ubLoop = ubNumberToDrop; ubLoop < pItemPtr->ubNumberOfObjects; ubLoop++)
01662             {
01663                   pInventorySlot->bStatus[ubLoop] = 0;
01664             }
01665       }
01666       pInventorySlot->ubNumberOfObjects = ubNumberToDrop;
01667 
01668       // remove a like number of objects from pObj
01669       RemoveObjs( pItemPtr, ubNumberToDrop );
01670       
01671       return( TRUE );
01672 }

01674 void MapInventoryPoolNextBtn( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01675 {
01676             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01677       {
01678         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01679       }
01680       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01681   {
01682     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01683             {
01684       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01685 
01686                   // if can go to next page, go there
01687                   if( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage < ( iLastInventoryPoolPage ) )
01688                   {
01689                         iCurrentInventoryPoolPage++;
01690                         fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01691                   }
01692             }
01693       }     
01694 }
01695 
01696 void MapInventoryPoolPrevBtn( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01697 {
01698             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01699       {
01700         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01701       }
01702       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01703   {
01704     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01705             {
01706       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01707 
01708                   // if can go to next page, go there
01709                   if( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage > 0 )
01710                   {
01711                         iCurrentInventoryPoolPage--;
01712                         fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01713                   }
01714             }
01715       }     
01716 }

01722       {
01723         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01724       }
01725       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01726   {
01727     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01728             {
01729       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01730 
01731                   // done
01732                   fShowMapInventoryPool = FALSE;
01733             }
01734       }

01738 
01739 void DisplayPagesForMapInventoryPool( void )
01740 {
01741       // get the current and last pages and display them
01742       CHAR16 sString[ 32 ];
01743       INT16 sX, sY;
01744 
01745       SetFont( COMPFONT );
01746       SetFontForeground( 183 );
01747       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01748

01757

01761

01764 
01765 INT32 GetTotalNumberOfItemsInSectorStash( void )
01766 {
01767       INT32 iCounter, iCount = 0;
01768 
01769       // run through list of items and find out how many are there
01770       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iTotalNumberOfSlots; iCounter++ )
01771       {
01772             if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter].o.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
01773             {
01774                   iCount += pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter].o.ubNumberOfObjects;
01775             }
01776       }
01777 
01778       return iCount;
01779 }
01780 
01781 
01782 INT32 GetTotalNumberOfItems( void )
01783 {
01784       INT32 iCounter, iCount = 0;
01785 
01786       // run through list of items and find out how many are there
01787       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iTotalNumberOfSlots; iCounter++ )
01788       {
01789             if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCounter].o.ubNumberOfObjects > 0 )
01790             {
01791                   iCount++;
01792             }
01793       }
01794 
01795       return iCount;
01796 }

01880 
01881 void CheckAndUnDateSlotAllocation( void )
01882 {
01883       // will check number of available slots, if less than half a page, allocate a new page
01884       INT32 iNumberOfTakenSlots = 0;
01885 
01886       // get number of taken slots
01887       iNumberOfTakenSlots = GetTotalNumberOfItems( );
01888 
01889       if( ( iTotalNumberOfSlots - iNumberOfTakenSlots ) < 2 )
01890       {
01891             // not enough space
01892             // need to make more space
01893             ReSizeStashListByThisAmount( MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT );
01894       }
01895 
01896       iLastInventoryPoolPage = ( ( iTotalNumberOfSlots  - 1 ) / MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT );
01897       
01898       return;
01899 }

01938 void HandleButtonStatesWhileMapInventoryActive( void )
01939 {
01940 
01941       // are we even showing the amp inventory pool graphic?
01942       if( fShowMapInventoryPool == FALSE )
01943       {
01944             return;
01945       }
01946 
01947       // first page, can't go back any
01948       if( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage == 0 )
01949       {
01950             DisableButton( guiMapInvenButton[ 1 ] );
01951       }
01952       else
01953       {
01954             EnableButton( guiMapInvenButton[ 1 ] );
01955       }
01956 
01957       // last page, go no further
01958       if( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage == iLastInventoryPoolPage )
01959       {
01960             DisableButton( guiMapInvenButton[ 0 ] );
01961       }
01962       else
01963       {
01964             EnableButton( guiMapInvenButton[ 0 ] );
01965       }
01966 
01967       // item picked up ..disable button
01968       if( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR )
01969       {
01970             DisableButton( guiMapInvenButton[ 2 ] );
01971       }
01972       else
01973       {
01974             EnableButton( guiMapInvenButton[ 2 ] );
01975       }
01976 }

02003 
02004 void HandleFlashForHighLightedItem( void )
02005 {
02006       INT32 iCurrentTime = 0;
02007       INT32 iDifference = 0;
02008 
02009 
02010       // if there is an invalid item, reset
02011       if( iCurrentlyHighLightedItem == -1 )
02012       {
02013             fFlashHighLightInventoryItemOnradarMap = FALSE;
02014             giFlashHighlightedItemBaseTime = 0;
02015       }
02016 
02017       // get the current time
02018       iCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02019 
02020       // if there basetime is uninit
02021       if( giFlashHighlightedItemBaseTime == 0 )
02022       {
02023             giFlashHighlightedItemBaseTime = iCurrentTime;
02024       }
02025 
02026 
02027       iDifference = iCurrentTime - giFlashHighlightedItemBaseTime;
02028 
02029       if( iDifference > DELAY_FOR_HIGHLIGHT_ITEM_FLASH )
02030       {
02031             // reset timer
02032             giFlashHighlightedItemBaseTime = iCurrentTime;
02033 
02034             // flip flag
02035             fFlashHighLightInventoryItemOnradarMap = !fFlashHighLightInventoryItemOnradarMap;
02036 
02037             // re render radar map
02038             RenderRadarScreen( );
02039 
02040       }
02041 }
02042 
02043 void HandleMouseInCompatableItemForMapSectorInventory( INT32 iCurrentSlot )
02044 {
02045       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
02046       static BOOLEAN fItemWasHighLighted = FALSE;
02047 
02048       if( iCurrentSlot == -1 )
02049       {
02050             giCompatibleItemBaseTime = 0;
02051       }
02052 
02053       if( fChangedInventorySlots == TRUE )
02054       {
02055             giCompatibleItemBaseTime = 0;
02056             fChangedInventorySlots = FALSE;
02057       }
02058 
02059       // reset the base time to the current game clock
02060       if( giCompatibleItemBaseTime == 0 )
02061       {
02062             giCompatibleItemBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
02063             
02064             if( fItemWasHighLighted == TRUE )
02065             {
02066                   fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
02067                   fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
02068                   fItemWasHighLighted = FALSE;
02069             }
02070       }
02071       
02072       ResetCompatibleItemArray( );
02073       ResetMapSectorInventoryPoolHighLights( );
02074 
02075       if( iCurrentSlot == -1 )
02076       {
02077             return;
02078       }
02079 
02080       // given this slot value, check if anything in the displayed sector inventory or on the mercs inventory is compatable
02081       if( fShowInventoryFlag )
02082       {
02083             // check if any compatable items in the soldier inventory matches with this item
02084             if( gfCheckForCursorOverMapSectorInventoryItem )
02085             {
02086                   pSoldier = &Menptr[ gCharactersList[ bSelectedInfoChar ].usSolID ];
02087                   if( pSoldier )
02088                   {
02089                         if( HandleCompatibleAmmoUIForMapScreen( pSoldier, iCurrentSlot + ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ), TRUE, FALSE ) )
02090                         {
02091                               if( GetJA2Clock( ) - giCompatibleItemBaseTime > 100 )
02092                               {
02093                                     if( fItemWasHighLighted == FALSE )
02094                                     {
02095                                           fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
02096                                           fItemWasHighLighted = TRUE;
02097                                     }
02098                               }
02099                         }
02100                   }
02101             }
02102             else
02103             {
02104                   giCompatibleItemBaseTime = 0;
02105             }
02106       }
02107       
02108 
02109       // now handle for the sector inventory
02110       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
02111       {
02112             // check if any compatable items in the soldier inventory matches with this item
02113             if( gfCheckForCursorOverMapSectorInventoryItem )
02114             {
02115                   if( HandleCompatibleAmmoUIForMapInventory( pSoldier, iCurrentSlot, ( iCurrentInventoryPoolPage * MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT ) , TRUE, FALSE ) )
02116                   {
02117                         if( GetJA2Clock( ) - giCompatibleItemBaseTime > 100 )
02118                         {
02119                               if( fItemWasHighLighted == FALSE )
02120                               {
02121                                     fItemWasHighLighted = TRUE;
02122                                     fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
02123                               }
02124                         }
02125                   }
02126             }
02127             else
02128             {
02129                   giCompatibleItemBaseTime = 0;
02130             }
02131       }
02132 
02133 
02134       return;
02135 }
02136 
02137 void ResetMapSectorInventoryPoolHighLights( void )
02138 {
02139       INT32 iCounter = 0;
02140 
02141       // now reset the highlight list for the map sector inventory
02142       for ( iCounter = 0; iCounter < MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_COUNT; iCounter++ )
02143       {
02144             if ( fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ iCounter ] )
02145             {
02146                   fMapInventoryItemCompatable[ iCounter ] = FALSE;
02147             }
02148       }
02149 
02150       return;
02151 }
02152 void HandleMapSectorInventory( void )

02156 
02157       return;

02161 //CJC look here to add/remove checks for the sector inventory
02162 BOOLEAN IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( WORLDITEM *pWorldItem )
02163 {
02164       if( pWorldItem->bVisible == 1 && 
02165                   pWorldItem->fExists && 
02166                   pWorldItem->o.usItem != SWITCH && 
02167                   pWorldItem->o.usItem != ACTION_ITEM &&
02168                   pWorldItem->o.bTrap <= 0 )
02169       {
02170             return( TRUE );
02171       }
02172 
02173       return( FALSE );
02174 }
02175 
02176 //CJC look here to add/remove checks for the sector inventory
02177 BOOLEAN IsMapScreenWorldItemInvisibleInMapInventory( WORLDITEM *pWorldItem )
02178 {
02179       if( pWorldItem->fExists &&
02180                   !IsMapScreenWorldItemVisibleInMapInventory( pWorldItem ) )
02181       {
02182             return( TRUE );
02183       }
02184 
02185       return( FALSE );
02186 }

02188 //Check to see if any of the items in the list have a gridno of NOWHERE and the entry point flag NOT set
02189 void CheckGridNoOfItemsInMapScreenMapInventory()
02190 {
02191       INT32 iCnt;
02192       UINT32 uiNumFlagsNotSet = 0;
02193       INT32  iTotalNumberItems = GetTotalNumberOfItems( );
02194 
02195 
02196       for( iCnt=0; iCnt<iTotalNumberItems; iCnt++)
02197       {
02198             if( pInventoryPoolList[ iCnt ].sGridNo == NOWHERE && !( pInventoryPoolList[ iCnt ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT ) )
02199             {
02200                   //set the flag
02201                   pInventoryPoolList[ iCnt ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT;
02202 
02203                   //count the number
02204                   uiNumFlagsNotSet++;
02205             }
02206       }
02207 
02208 
02209       //loop through all the UNSEEN items
02210       for( iCnt=0; iCnt<(INT32)uiNumberOfUnSeenItems; iCnt++)
02211       {
02212             if( pUnSeenItems[ iCnt ].sGridNo == NOWHERE && !( pUnSeenItems[ iCnt ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT ) )
02213             {
02214                   //set the flag
02215                   pUnSeenItems[ iCnt ].usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_GRIDNO_NOT_SET_USE_ENTRY_POINT;
02216 
02217                   //count the number
02218                   uiNumFlagsNotSet++;
02219             }
02220       }
02221 
02222 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION   
02223       if( uiNumFlagsNotSet > 0 )
02224       {
02225             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Item with invalid gridno doesnt have flag set.", uiNumFlagsNotSet );
02226       }
02227 #endif
02228 }

02231 void SortSectorInventory( WORLDITEM *pInventory, UINT32 uiSizeOfArray )
02232 {
02233       qsort( (LPVOID)pInventory, (size_t) uiSizeOfArray, sizeof(WORLDITEM), MapScreenSectorInventoryCompare );
02234 }
02235 
02236 
02237 INT32 MapScreenSectorInventoryCompare( const void *pNum1, const void *pNum2)
02238 {
02239       WORLDITEM *pFirst = (WORLDITEM *)pNum1;
02240       WORLDITEM *pSecond = (WORLDITEM *)pNum2;
02241       UINT16      usItem1Index;
02242       UINT16      usItem2Index;
02243       UINT8       ubItem1Quality;
02244       UINT8       ubItem2Quality;
02245 
02246       usItem1Index = pFirst->o.usItem;
02247       usItem2Index = pSecond->o.usItem;
02248 
02249       ubItem1Quality = pFirst->o.bStatus[ 0 ];
02250       ubItem2Quality = pSecond->o.bStatus[ 0 ];
02251 
02252       return( CompareItemsForSorting( usItem1Index, usItem2Index, ubItem1Quality, ubItem2Quality ) );
02253 }
02254 
02255 BOOLEAN CanPlayerUseSectorInventory( SOLDIERTYPE *pSelectedSoldier )
02256 {
02257       INT16 sSectorX, sSectorY, sSectorZ;
02258       BOOLEAN fInCombat;
02259 
02260       //Get the sector that has a battle
02261       fInCombat = GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZAndReturnTRUEIfThereIsABattle( &sSectorX, &sSectorY, &sSectorZ );
02262 
02263       //if there is a battle going on
02264       if( fInCombat )
02265       {
02266             //if the selected map is the one with the combat
02267             if( ( ( sSelMapX == sSectorX ) &&
02268                               ( sSelMapY == sSectorY ) &&
02269                               ( iCurrentMapSectorZ == sSectorZ )
02270                         )
02271                   )
02272             {
02273                   return( FALSE );
02274             }
02275       }
02276 
02277       return( TRUE );
02278 }
